00040 int ICMPSerializer::serialize(const ICMPMessage *pkt, unsigned char *buf, unsigned int bufsize)
00041 {
00042     struct icmp *icmp = (struct icmp *) (buf);
00043     int packetLength;
00044 
00045     packetLength = ICMP_MINLEN;
00046 
00047     switch(pkt->getType())
00048     {
00049         case ICMP_ECHO_REQUEST:
00050         {
00051             PingPayload *pp = check_and_cast<PingPayload* >(pkt->getEncapsulatedMsg());
00052             icmp->icmp_type = ICMP_ECHO;
00053             icmp->icmp_code = 0;
00054             icmp->icmp_id   = htons(pp->getOriginatorId());
00055             icmp->icmp_seq  = htons(pp->getSeqNo());
00056             unsigned int datalen = (pp->getByteLength() - 4);
00057             for (unsigned int i=0; i < datalen; i++)
00058                 if (i < pp->getDataArraySize()) {
00059                     icmp->icmp_data[i] = pp->getData(i);
00060                 } else {
00061                     icmp->icmp_data[i] = 'a';
00062                 }
00063             packetLength += datalen;
00064             break;
00065         }
00066         case ICMP_ECHO_REPLY:
00067         {
00068             PingPayload *pp = check_and_cast<PingPayload* >(pkt->getEncapsulatedMsg());
00069             icmp->icmp_type = ICMP_ECHOREPLY;
00070             icmp->icmp_code = 0;
00071             icmp->icmp_id   = htons(pp->getOriginatorId());
00072             icmp->icmp_seq  = htons(pp->getSeqNo());
00073             unsigned int datalen = pp->getDataArraySize();
00074             for(unsigned int i=0; i < datalen; i++)
00075                 icmp->icmp_data[i] = pp->getData(i);
00076             packetLength += datalen;
00077             break;
00078         }
00079         case ICMP_DESTINATION_UNREACHABLE:
00080         {
00081             IPDatagram *ip = check_and_cast<IPDatagram* >(pkt->getEncapsulatedMsg());
00082             icmp->icmp_type = ICMP_UNREACH;
00083             icmp->icmp_code = pkt->getCode();
00084             packetLength += IPSerializer().serialize(ip, (unsigned char *)icmp->icmp_data, bufsize - ICMP_MINLEN);
00085             break;
00086         }
00087         case ICMP_TIME_EXCEEDED:
00088         {
00089             IPDatagram *ip = check_and_cast<IPDatagram* >(pkt->getEncapsulatedMsg());
00090             icmp->icmp_type = ICMP_TIMXCEED;
00091             icmp->icmp_code = ICMP_TIMXCEED_INTRANS;
00092             packetLength += IPSerializer().serialize(ip, (unsigned char *)icmp->icmp_data, bufsize - ICMP_MINLEN);
00093             break;
00094         }
00095         default:
00096         {
00097             packetLength = 0;
00098             EV << "Can not serialize ICMP packet: type " << pkt->getType() << " not supported.";
00099             break;
00100         }
00101     }
00102     icmp->icmp_cksum = TCPIPchecksum::checksum(buf, packetLength);
00103     return packetLength;
00104 }
00105 
00106 void ICMPSerializer::parse(const unsigned char *buf, unsigned int bufsize, ICMPMessage *pkt)
00107 {
00108     struct icmp *icmp = (struct icmp*) buf;
00109 
00110     switch(icmp->icmp_type)
00111     {
00112         case ICMP_ECHO:
00113         {
00114             PingPayload *pp;
00115             char name[32];
00116 
00117             pkt->setType(ICMP_ECHO_REQUEST);
00118             pkt->setCode(0);
00119             pkt->setByteLength(4);
00120             sprintf(name,"ping%d", ntohs(icmp->icmp_seq));
00121             pp = new PingPayload(name);
00122             pp->setOriginatorId(ntohs(icmp->icmp_id));
00123             pp->setSeqNo(ntohs(icmp->icmp_seq));
00124             pp->setByteLength(bufsize - 4);
00125             pp->setDataArraySize(bufsize - ICMP_MINLEN);
00126             for(unsigned int i=0; i<bufsize - ICMP_MINLEN; i++)
00127                 pp->setData(i, icmp->icmp_data[i]);
00128             pkt->encapsulate(pp);
00129             pkt->setName(pp->getName());
00130             break;
00131         }
00132         case ICMP_ECHOREPLY:
00133         {
00134             PingPayload *pp;
00135             char name[32];
00136 
00137             pkt->setType(ICMP_ECHO_REPLY);
00138             pkt->setCode(0);
00139             pkt->setByteLength(4);
00140             sprintf(name,"ping%d-reply", ntohs(icmp->icmp_seq));
00141             pp = new PingPayload(name);
00142             pp->setOriginatorId(ntohs(icmp->icmp_id));
00143             pp->setSeqNo(ntohs(icmp->icmp_seq));
00144             pp->setByteLength(bufsize - 4);
00145             pp->setDataArraySize(bufsize - ICMP_MINLEN);
00146             for (unsigned int i=0; i<bufsize - ICMP_MINLEN; i++)
00147                 pp->setData(i, icmp->icmp_data[i]);
00148             pkt->encapsulate(pp);
00149             pkt->setName(pp->getName());
00150             break;
00151         }
00152         default:
00153         {
00154             EV << "Can not create ICMP packet: type " << icmp->icmp_type << " not supported.";
00155             break;
00156         }
00157     }
00158 }
